metadata.name: McMelt TV
metadata.description:
Commerce of money in a commercial of artificial intelligence propaganda of the individual mind. It is easier to predict the future if you can manipulate the information space. Will pursuit of power and money bring us to extinction?

Ai model trained on McDonalds Commercial Tomato McGrand 2005 with Agota Varga.

This is an installation on a a color CRT TV 4:3 signed by the artist. Video is played from an iPhone4. 

This NFT is a token for the physical manifestation of this art. The CRT and video player may be replaced by any size CRT 4:3 which is also a CRT or an emulation of one once CRTs are no longer in existence. 

The price of the first purchase includes delivery of the CRT TV and video player device and video art.  The devices might be substituted depending on the power requirements of the country delivered to. If possible the artist will deliver. (Contact artist for information on which countries it can be delivered to. US sanctions and regulations apply.) 

The owner of this token is authorized to publicly exhibit the McMelt TV installation even if the original device is destroyed or missing. This token is the official record of ownership.

The first part of the video attached to this token or additional copies in the metadata record is the video to be displayed on the CRT TV screen.
